verses.verse: "Speak <WH1696> to Aaron, <WH175> and to his sons, <WH1121> and to all the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and say <WH559> to them: <WH1697> 'This is the thing which Yahweh <WH3068> has commanded, <WH6680>

Whatever <WH376> man <WH376> there is of the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> who kills <WH7819> a bull, <WH7794> or lamb, <WH3775> or goat, <WH5795> in the camp, <WH4264> or who kills <WH7819> it outside <WH2351> the camp, <WH4264>

and hasn't <WH935> brought it to the door <WH6607> of the Tent <WH168> of Meeting, <WH4150> to offer <WH7126> it as an offering <WH7133> to Yahweh <WH3068> before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH4908> of Yahweh: <WH3068> blood <WH1818> shall be imputed <WH2803> to that man. <WH376> He has shed <WH8210> blood; <WH1818> and that man <WH376> shall be cut off <WH3772> from among <WH7130> his people. <WH5971>

This is to the end that the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> may bring <WH935> their sacrifices, <WH2077> which they sacrifice <WH2076> in the open <WH6440> field, <WH7704> that they may bring <WH935> them to Yahweh, <WH3068> to the door <WH6607> of the Tent <WH168> of Meeting, <WH4150> to the priest, <WH3548> and sacrifice <WH2076> them for sacrifices of peace <WH8002> offerings <WH2077> to Yahweh. <WH3068>

The priest <WH3548> shall sprinkle <WH2236> the blood <WH1818> on the altar <WH4196> of Yahweh <WH3068> at the door <WH6607> of the Tent <WH168> of Meeting, <WH4150> and burn <WH6999> the fat <WH2459> for a pleasant <WH5207> aroma <WH7381> to Yahweh. <WH3068>

They shall no more sacrifice <WH2076> their sacrifices <WH2077> to the goat <WH8163> idols, <WH310> after which they play the prostitute. <WH2181> This shall be a statute <WH2708> forever <WH5769> to them throughout their generations. <WH1755>'

"You shall say <WH559> to them, <WH376> 'Any man there is of the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> or of the strangers <WH1616> who live as foreigners <WH1481> among <WH8432> them, <WH5927> who offers a burnt offering <WH5930> or sacrifice, <WH2077>

and doesn't <WH935> bring it to the door <WH6607> of the Tent <WH168> of Meeting, <WH4150> to sacrifice <WH6213> it to Yahweh; <WH3068> that man <WH376> shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people. <WH5971>

<WH376>"'Any man of the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> or of the strangers <WH1616> who live as foreigners <WH1481> among <WH8432> them, <WH398> who eats any kind of blood, <WH1818> I will set <WH5414> my face <WH6440> against that soul <WH5315> who eats <WH398> blood, <WH1818> and will cut him off <WH3772> from among <WH7130> his people. <WH5971>

For the life <WH5315> of the flesh <WH1320> is in the blood; <WH1818> and I have given <WH5414> it to you on the altar <WH4196> to make atonement <WH3722> for your souls: <WH5315> for it is the blood <WH1818> that makes atonement <WH3722> by reason of the life. <WH5315>

Therefore I have said <WH559> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> "No person <WH5315> among you shall eat <WH398> blood, <WH1818> neither shall any stranger <WH1616> who lives as a foreigner <WH1616> among <WH8432> you eat <WH398> blood. <WH1818>"

<WH376>"'Whatever man there is of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> or of the strangers <WH1616> who live as foreigners <WH1481> among <WH8432> them, <WH6718> who takes in hunting <WH6679> any animal <WH2416> or bird <WH5775> that may be eaten; <WH398> he shall pour <WH8210> out its blood, <WH1818> and cover <WH3680> it with dust. <WH6083>

For as to the life <WH5315> of all flesh, <WH1320> its blood <WH1818> is with its life: <WH5315> therefore I said <WH559> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> "You shall not eat <WH398> the blood <WH1818> of any kind of flesh; <WH1320> for the life <WH5315> of all flesh <WH1320> is its blood. <WH1818> Whoever eats <WH398> it shall be cut off. <WH3772>"

<WH5315>"'Every person that eats <WH398> what dies <WH5038> of itself, <WH2966> or that which is torn by animals, <WH249> whether he is native-born or a foreigner, <WH1616> he shall wash <WH3526> his clothes, <WH899> and bathe <WH3526> himself in water, <WH4325> and be unclean <WH2930> until the evening: <WH6153> then he shall be clean. <WH2891>
But if he doesn't <WH3526> wash them, <WH7364> or bathe his flesh, <WH1320> then he shall bear <WH5375> his iniquity. <WH5771>'"
